short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tells you what class you have each week, contains an alarm leading up to class and aswell as a countdown.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension informs students of their weekly class schedule. The new quadmester system introduced during the Covid-19 pandemic by certain schools results in a weekly swap in class time slots. This extension displays the correct class schedule each week with additional functionality such as a countdown timer to the start time of each class.
Updates:

V 1.1: 
- Added Optional Alarm
- Made the theme more exciting
- Fixed bugs related to single class inputs
- On the weekend it now tells you what time class starts the next week
- Added a countdown to the end of class
